artist: Silversmith: Sebastian Henry Garrard; Retailer: Garrard & Co.
creditline: Gift of Jan and Bill Spoor
description: rectangular shape with clipped corners; applied feet with fleur-de-lis motif; top of box decorated with flowers at edges and central design with two hunters capturing a winged creature in a foliated area; two birds overhead
inscription:
Inscription and Mark

on bottom, stamped: [GARRARD & Co Ltd HAYMARKET LONDON]; at PR side, stamped: [SG (rampant lion) (cat\'s head) O]; at interior of cover, stamped: [SG rampant lion) O]
object_name: Box with hinged cover, from a toilette set
title: Box with hinged cover, from a toilette set
